official_title: Mychoice: Testing an Interactive mHealth Tool to Enhance Communication and Informed Decision Making About Clinical Trial Participation in Cancer Patients
inclusion_criteria:
* 18 years of age or over
* Active diagnosis of invasive cancer (any diagnoses), pre or post chemo/radiation/surgery
* Able to speak and read English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Participated in a therapeutic trial in the past
